meta.title: Whisper Cheap - Free Local Speech-to-Text for Windows
meta.description: Transform your voice into text instantly. 100% local, no internet required. Fast, private, and completely free speech recognition powered by AI.
meta.keywords: speech to text, voice recognition, transcription, Windows, offline, local, free, STT, voice to text, dictation

hero.title: Your voice,
hero.subtitle: Stop typing. Start talking. Whisper Cheap transcribes your voice in real-time, directly on your computer. No cloud. No subscriptions. No limits.

features.title: Why Whisper Cheap?
features.subtitle: Built for people who value their time and privacy.

local.title: 100% Offline
local.description: Everything runs on your PC. Your voice never leaves your device. No internet connection needed after download.

fast.title: Blazing Fast
fast.description: Powered by Parakeet V3, an optimized neural network. Transcribes in milliseconds, not seconds.

free.title: Actually Free
free.description: No trials. No subscriptions. No hidden costs. Download, install, use forever.

hotkey.title: One Hotkey Away
hotkey.description: Press your shortcut, speak, release. Text appears wherever your cursor is. That simple.

vad.title: Smart Voice Detection
vad.description: Silero VAD filters background noise. Only your voice gets transcribed.

llm.title: AI Enhancement (Optional)
llm.description: Connect to OpenRouter for grammar fixes and formatting. Entirely optional.

step2.title: Speak
step2.description: Talk naturally. A subtle overlay shows you're recording.

step3.title: Done
step3.description: Release the key. Text appears at your cursor instantly.

cta.title: Ready to stop typing?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands who've already made the switch.

footer.by: for fast typists who hate typing
